item.title: LitNews 踩坑记录
item.description: GitHub Actions 编译 使用 GitHub Actions 进行多端编译 MacOS 错误提示 Can't locate Mac/Memory.pm in @INC (you may need to install the Mac:: Memory module) 解决方案： npm install electron-builder@latest -D Windows 编译出错 需要为 Windows 配置基础环境,windows-build-tools 出现 ------------------- Python -------------------- Successfully installed Python 2.7---------- Visual Studio Build Tools ---------- Still waiting for installer log file... 解决方案： npm install --global --production windows-build-tools@4.0.0
